text: neohui ma-eumsog-e dasi saengmyeong-eul gajgiga eolyeoun daleun pijomul-i doen da hadeolado changjojuui neunglyeog-eun bu jogham-i eobsnola hani geudeul-i nuga uliui saengmyeong-eul jaesaenghaneunyo lago muddeola illeogalodoe choecho-e neohuileulchangjohan bun-isila geudeul-eun tto gogae leul heundeulmyeo geugeos-i eonjeinyo lago mul-euni geugeos-i god gakkawassnola
